meanings.definition: The process of reproducing graphic materials, especially through photocopying or printing.
meanings.sent1: The reprographics of the poster was done perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The office relies on reprographics to make copies of important documents.
meanings.sent3: The reprographics machine decided to take a break and refused to copy anything.
meanings.sent4: Her memory worked like a reprographics machine, duplicating every detail flawlessly.
meanings.sent5: The magic show featured a reprographics trick where a single image multiplied into a hundred.

meanings.definition: The industry or department responsible for reproducing documents and images.
meanings.sent1: The reprographics department is always busy with printing tasks.
meanings.sent2: She found a job in the reprographics industry after graduation.
meanings.sent3: The reprographics team had a competition to see who could make the most copies in an hour.
meanings.sent4: The reprographics sector is the backbone of the publishing world, ensuring materials reach the masses.
meanings.sent5: In the reprographics business, speed and accuracy are key to success.
